Title: The Bird Has Flown
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Taylor Elmore, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story 'Fire in the Hole' by), Ingrid Escajeda (executive story editor), VJ Boyd (story)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Raylan tries to track down Randall, Lindsey, and his stolen money. Meanwhile, Ava has to figure out how to tie up loose ends with Ellen Mae.
